item.description:
This Meetup will be cross-posted with Fun with Alcohol. (Note: you can skip Grendels and join us at John Harvards if you prefer.)

Grendel's has always been a favorite Meetup venue. The food menu between 5 and 7:30 indoors is half price! with purchase of $3 drink.

http://www.grendelsden.com/menu/entrees.htm...

"Reverse Happy Hour" (shall we call it) means that the food gets half off instead of the drinks, which amounts to the same thing. I recommend you choose your order from the daily specials!

Following this we leave Grendels at about 7:00 and head over to JOHN HARVARD'S original Brewery nearby. They have 20-oz."beer flights" there which cost the same as ordinary 16 oz. drafts. That means you can sample all the beers they produce there.

http://www.johnharvards.com/index.shtml

I have reserved a table at John Harvard's for 7:15 for these meetups. They say "drinks only" is fine with them.

Note on Grendels: the later you come the less easy it is to find seating, introduce yourself, & get promptly served. Grendels will fill up fast and get steadily louder.

Directions: take the Red Line subway to Harvard Square (recommended). If you choose to drive, you can park at the Charles Hotel parking garage, one Bennett St.
item.name: Happy Hour Grendels Den and John Harvard's Beer Tasting!
